data.eml:eml: Definition of the Lonchaea polyhamata species-group (Diptera, Lonchaeidae) with a description of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Macgowan, Iain (2018): Definition of the Lonchaea polyhamata species-group (Diptera, Lonchaeidae) with a description of new species. Zootaxa 4446 (3): 325-342, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4446.3.2
